coding style


C coding style applied throughout the source code


header file

#ifndef FILE_H
#define FILE_H

// ...

#endif // FILE_H

function

void prefix_function_name(char *param_name);

function pointer

typedef void (*function_pointer_func)(void);

struct

typedef struct {
	int a;
} MyStructName;

enum

typedef enum {
	NAME_VAL_0,
	NAME_VAL_1,
	NAME_COUNT
} MyEnumName;

union

typedef union {
	int e;
	float f;
} MyUnionName;

variables

static char s_static_var;

static const char sc_static_const_var;

extern char g_global_var;

extern const char gc_global_var;

void my_function()
{
	char c_local_var;
}

preprocessor

#define PREFIX_MACRO(param) do_something(param)

#define C_CONSTANT_NAME 0

#define prefix_function_name function_name
